transcript:
Customer: Mangal bhavan amangal hari
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning Ramu sir Imran baat kar raha tha India mart se kaise sir aap bolo bhai.
Executive: Haan ji sir kal kal aapse discuss hua tha na sir maine apne manager ko bhi highlight kiya tha sir so I hope aapka discussion.
Customer: Are bhai wo bola 4 baje tum log ka na mere baat sun lena boliye ya to kaam karne ka tarika nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai 4 baje dusre ko bol ke 4 baje phone nahi karta jyada siyana samajh raha hai madam bhi tumhara theek hai.
Executive: Kya hua matlab samjha nahi main.
Customer: Us baat ko close kar do theek hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Mere baat sun lena tumhara senior manager hai kuch bhi rahe naukri naukri ke tarah karta hai 4 baje dusre ko bol ke wait karwa ke phone nahi karega wo usse badtameez aadmi koi rahega ye batao.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: Nahi to abhi sir.
Customer: Are manager hai wo mera manager hai kya India mart ke na India mart ke bahan ke lode ke bolo jo malik hai mere paas phone kar lega.
Executive: Sir dekhiye sir Ramu sir ek to pehli baat sir hum aaram se baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Main Ramu sir kya hai main kal intezar karte reh gaya are nahi phone karna seedha bolo ki nahi phone karenge.
Executive: To aapka baat to hua tha na sir 1:30 baje ke aas pass.
Customer: 1:30 baje bola main 4 baje phone karenge.
Customer: 4 baje kyu nahi kiya bhai kiska response hai mera hai ki uska hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: To actually mera call karne ka purpose ye tha sir ki maine bhi yaha pe feedback diya sir ki buyleads wagera kafi kam available hai sir aapke products.
Customer: Humne kaam ka matlab nahi humse paisa liya humko buylead nahi aayega to mera paisa return karo bhai pura ke pura.
Executive: Haan to wahi usi regarding maine call kiya sir ki abhi hum aapka account.
Customer: Yaar 10 din phone karoge 10 din kya 10 din kya 10 din mujhe game kheloge kya mere sath.
Executive: Are sir sunna hota game khelna hota sir to main aapko kal bhi connect kyu karta sir aap hi mujhe bataye sir.
Customer: Game hi khelna hai aapne mujhe clearly bola ki mera onboarding person se baat ho gaya hai wo saturday ko mere se milne aayega main pehle unse baat karunga fir main aapko bataunga.
Executive: Phone hi nahi utha raha hai mere baat sun lo.
Customer: Phone nahi utha raha hai theek hai paisa le gaya mere baat sun lo paisa le gaya koi baat nahi 32000 na koi maine nahi rakha jata 37000 mere baat sun lena.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Sun lena mera baat theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai boliye.
Customer: Main bhai panch employee ko de deta hu paisa na ye bhi main paisa samajh lunga ab chod diya theek hai.
Customer: Lekin dusri baar ke India mart ke baap ka bhi himmat nahi hoga ki mere darwaze pe aa jayega ya phone kar lega.
Executive: Ab Ramu sir main ek cheez bolu sir aapko haan bolo.
Customer: Aapka kal mam se baat hua na sir 1:30 baje ke aas pass to abhi humne bhi us cheez ko consider kiya sir aur abhi hum kya kar rahe hain sir ki aapki services jo hai na sir wo deactivation ke regarding humne aage proceed kar diya hai sir I hope aaj ya kal sham tak aapka account sir deactivate ho jayega aur jo aapka remaining amount bacha hua hai na sir jo bhi amount aapka remaining.
Customer: Mujhe pura chahiye bhaiya pura chahiye.
Executive: Pura amount to refund nahi hota sir wo pro data.
Customer: Main uske upar FIR darj karenge ab mere sath lad lega India mart jo karna hai.
Executive: Ladne ka baat nahi hai sir koi bhi aap.
Customer: Lad India mart India mart jo malik hai na wo bhi aayega mere paas.
Customer: Mere baat suno mujhe harassment kar diye tum log harassment nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Nahi nahi harassment matlab ye harassment ho gaya na ek to tumne ka paisa le gaya India mart se kaam nahi diya.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Theek hai main google meet pe aa jao google bhai main tumhara naukri nahi kar raha hu.
Executive: Nahi sir naukri ka baat nahi hai sir ab man lijiye.
Customer: Nahi nahi India mart ke main naukri kar raha hu ki India mart se maine paisa liya hai ye mujhe bata dena main apna jawab de denge haan bolo main ek cheez aapko bolu sir ab man lijiye sir aapka account sir India mart mein onboard hua sir hydro green technology karke theek hai sir aap apna sir company ka profile sir aap kabhi bhi sir google pe ja ke search kijiyega sir hydroganic hydro green technology sir sitamarhi bihar sir ek sir aapka account ka visit.
Customer: Sitamarhi bihar ke liye nahi dala tha main all india ke liye dala tha meri pehle baat nahi keh raha haan haan.
Customer: Hum paisa kis baat ke usne bola theek hai humne on board paisa de diya main to waise deta nahi hai waise kisi ko paisa main to bhai quotation leta hu fir p order banata hu fir deta hu legal kaam karte hain aap legal humse paisa le gaye check se le gaye theek hai koi baat nahi humne de diya uske baad aapne kaam nahi diya theek hai aapko khud hi karna chahiye bolna chahiye ki bhai hamare paas kaam nahi hai lead hai hi nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Agar mujhe kaam aap aap doge mujhe STP ke kaam karne ke liye theek hai aur technology naya aayega theek hai main us kaam ko kar nahi payenge pehle mana karenge ki nahi karenge mujhe bata do na.
Executive: Samajh gaya sir dekhiye us cheez ko company bhi sir consider karti hai sir isi wajah se sir na aapne sir hamare paas ek saal ka service liya tha sir aur ek saal ka service ke liye na sir aapko bhi lagte ho na to hamare proposal bhi aap approve karte ho sir yaha pe clearly mention rehta hai sir ki aap one year ke liye itna amount India mart ko sir pay kar rahe ho sir us cheez ko humne bhi sir consider kiya sir ki buylead ka issue hai sir.
Customer: Boli se sorry hota hai yaar.
Executive: Sir boli se hota na sir to jo amount aapne diya tha sir might bhi wo refund nahi hota sir aapka september se sir services live hui thi sir to isi regarding sir kal bhi humne.
Customer: Galti kiska hai mera hai ki bhai India mart ke mujhe batao.
Executive: Matlab galti matlab mujhe samjha nahi sir dekhiye sir aisa bhi nahi hai ki sir ek bhi buylead approve nahi ho rahi ho rahi hai sir but kam hai jo ki sold out ho jati sir kyuki product line me sir competition hai maine starting me bhi aapko bataya tha clearly sir.
Customer: Client to us baat ko nahi samjhega na bhai nahi theek hai wo baat nahi samjhega na.
Executive: Haan to isi regarding to aap keh rahe the na sir ki 32000 main chod de raha hu 32000 maine de diya usko main nahi but hum kya kar rahe hain sir abhi jo aapka remaining type ka bacha hua hai na sir man lijiye sir ek example le raha hu sir ki dedh mahine ke aas pass ka aapka service use ho gaya dedh do mahina man lijiye sir do mahine ke aas pass ka baki 10 mahine ka paisa hum aapko refund to kar hi rahe hain na sir jo aapka remaining amount hai sir wo to hum kar rahe hain wo to hum nahi keh rahe hain na sir ki aapka ek bhi rupya hum refund nahi kar rahe hain sir wo pro data basis pe hota hai uske according hum aapka karwa rahe hain sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aisa to nahi hai ki humne aapko clearly mana kar diya ki Ramu sir nahi hum koi bhi amount aapka refund nahi karenge sir jo cheez mujhe aap bata rahe the pehle sir kya sir.
Customer: Mere baat suno aap bhi mana kar do ki nahi denge mail pe likh do sir jo cheez maine aapko jo cheez ka mujhe approval mil gaya hamare company ka policy hai uske according hum to proceed kar rahe hain wo cheez main aapko kyu bolunga ki mail pe kyu baat ho sakta hai mera bata do.
Executive: Wo cheez to sir possible nahi hai sir.
Customer: Nahi wo pradhan mantri to nahi hai ki baat nahi hoga bhai.
Executive: Abhi aap kya chahte hain aap bataye sir.
Customer: Main bhaiya face to face one to one karna chahta hai jaise paisa le gaya hai ek to ye banda ko bhai jo le gaya hai usse mere samne lao theek hai ek jaise main director hu wo bhi ek director hai theek hai hum one to one karna chahte hain bhai.
Executive: Chaliye.
Customer: Paisa to apni jagah hai yaar paisa to apni jagah hai.
Customer: Pehle India mart kya karta tha uska malik kya karta tha humko sab pata hai main bhi kya karta hai unko bhi pata tha theek hai main bhi ek naukri karke aaya hai theek hai.
Executive: Achchi baat hai sir.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai sir main baat kar leta hu apne manager se.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for the subscription amount.

- Alleges harassment and unprofessional behavior.

- Wants to have a face-to-face meeting with director.



Resolution:

- Executive assured deactivation of account.

- Executive confirmed remaining amount will be refunded.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss with manager.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, deactivation, harassment, buyleads
